job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtThis is a work from anywhere position though if you want to visit the office you can just north of DCltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe BayTech Group a boutique recruiting firm is seeking a Lead Software Engineer for a growing organization developing Automation and AI Software in the US based out of the DC arealtpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a Lead and a Senior SW Engineer to help drive design architecture and development decisions on 48 person development teamsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequired andor preferredltpgtltulgtltligt13 years of Lead Engineering experience developing scalable web apps focusing on Javascript Nodejs Typescript etcltligtltligtAbility and interest in contributing to design and architecture of custom software applicationsltligtltligtDesire to work on a team with quality development processes including Unit Testing and TDDltligtltligtStrength in NodeJS ideal open to a polyglotltligtltligtAWS or GCP exposure a plusltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf youre interested in blank slategreenfield software engineering and new products please explore this position The Software Engineers weve placed on this team like it for several reasons including a ton of new development and worklife balance not more than 40 hour weeksltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtAbout the BayTech Group We are independent We dont work as part of a global staffing firm and we only work on a limited number of preferred attractive positions with reputable organizations We aim for professionalism and we wont waste your timeltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
